## Mariculture production 
Making dataset ready for analyses. 

```{r data}
akva<-read.table("raw/Akvadataut.csv", header=TRUE, sep=";") #load data
akva<-na.omit(akva)# remove NAs
prod<-select(akva, Kname, Yrs, Knr2017, Total.Production)#subset variables  
head(prod)

write.csv(prod, "data/total_mariculture_production.csv")
```
